summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 50th Avenue Southwest for West Oregon Street to approximately 90 feet north of West Edmunds Street; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17248 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
